author: P.Eugen

replies.content: Hehehe~ Mayo-be I do?

comments.content: So, how'd it taste?

replies.content: Honestly... surprisingly good.

author: Amagi

replies.content: I'm curious how a real one tastes... but Kaga told me to stop before I could as much as put it in my mouth.
